metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2782 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in Open-source ARJ archiver 3.10.22 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted ARJ archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2782` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

arj - 3.10.22-13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: arj package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.10.22-13').
